channel.title: Project-Durocity (iClarity V1.5) APPLY HERE
channel.description:
[center]Okay so I've decided to create a new thread regarding server projects! This time, with a better source so I don't waste my time with combat and stuff. We'll be using [b]iClarity V1.5[/b]. It's a good source to start with and to edit. It's not a gay delta, not completed nor too empty. Seems challenging to work on. Please try to comment and rate on your spare time.
[SIZE="5"][COLOR="black"][COLOR="Red"]Progress[/COLOR][/COLOR][/SIZE] [SIZE="6"][COLOR="green"]|||[/COLOR]|||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||[/SIZE]
[SIZE="6"]Hoped on achievements[/SIZE] -Full combat related xp rates -Important item sounds (Frame 106) -Music (maybe) -100% skills -Full emotes -Full Obelisks -Magic Spells + sounds -Good stability -Anti-SYI + NULL -Minigames -Duel Arena -Fixed items + Shops
More to add..
[SIZE="6"]What we have so far,[/SIZE] -Various Weapon specials -317 Gameframe -Awesome combat system -Awesome Range system -70% completed magic system -Frame 106 started -Low + High alchs -PK'ing skulling fix -Anti-dupe (basic) -Show equipment stats screen -Fight cave -Barrows -Slayer -Cooking -Fletching -Fishing -Woodcutting
[SIZE="5"]Application for registering[/SIZE]
[b]Server Coder[/b] [code] Planned Ingame name:
Experiences:

How long are you active?

item.title: Project-Durocity (iClarity V1.5) APPLY HERE
item.dc:creator: @ghostkid303 ghostkid303
item.description:
@ghostkid303 wrote:

[center]Okay so I’ve decided to create a new thread regarding server projects! This time, with a better source so I don’t waste my time with combat and stuff. We’ll be using iClarity V1.5. It’s a good source to start with and to edit. It’s not a gay delta, not completed nor too empty. Seems challenging to work on. Please try to comment and rate on your spare time.

[SIZE=“5”][COLOR=“black”][COLOR=“Red”]Progress[/COLOR][/COLOR][/SIZE]
